title: SEO Title
titleHtmlHelp:
Leave blank in most cases. Your page title will be used automatically.

⚠️ Warning: If you use a custom SEO title, make sure it accurately describes your page content. Search engines compare your SEO title against your actual page content and structured data. Mismatches can harm your rankings.
descriptionHtmlHelp: A brief description of this page for search engines (155-160 characters recommended).
robotsHtmlHelp: Control how search engines crawl and index this page.
robotsNoFollow: No Follow (don't follow links on this page)
robotsNoIndex: No Index (don't show this page in search results)
canonicalHelp: Select another page to indicate it's the preferred version of this content.
canonicalModuleHelp: Select a {{type}} to use as the canonical URL for this content.
llmsTxtSelectionHelp: Control how AI systems and large language models interact with your content. This generates an /llms.txt file that helps establish policies for AI crawling, training, and usage.
llmsCustomTextHelp: Enter your custom llms.txt content. This completely replaces the auto-generated content and gives you full control over AI crawler policies.
schemaTypeHelp: Select the type of structured data for this page. This helps search engines understand your content.
siteNameHelp: The name of your website (used in structured data and social sharing).
siteDescriptionHelp: A brief description of your website.
siteCanonicalUrlHelp: The base URL of your site (e.g., https://example.com). Required for proper canonical links and structured data.
themeColorHelp: Set the browser chrome color for mobile devices and PWAs.
themeColorSingleHelp: The color for mobile browser chrome.
themeColorLightHelp: Theme color when user prefers light mode.
themeColorDarkHelp: Theme color when user prefers dark mode.
organizationInfoHelp: Information about your organization for structured data.
socialProfilesHelp: Add your organization's social media profiles. The Twitter/X handle will be used for Twitter Card meta tags.
profileUrlHelp: Full URL to your profile (e.g., https://twitter.com/yourusername)
searchQueryParamHelp: The query parameter your site uses for search (e.g., 'q', 'search', 'query')
gtmIdHelp: Your Google Tag Manager container ID (e.g., GTM-XXXXXXX).
gaIdHelp: Your Google Analytics measurement ID (e.g., G-XXXXXXXXXX).
googleVerifyIdHelp: Google Search Console verification meta tag content.
robotsTxtSelectionHelp: Control how search engines and LLMs crawl your site.
robotsAISelectiveHelp: Choose which AI crawlers can access your content. Blocking AI training crawlers does not affect traditional search rankings. Browsing crawlers (ChatGPT-User, Claude-User) serve real-time user queries, while training crawlers (GPTBot, ClaudeBot) build AI datasets.
gtinHelp: Global Trade Item Number (UPC, EAN, ISBN, etc.).
businessDetailsHelp: Information for Local Business schema markup.
hoursHelp: Format: Mo-Fr 09:00-17:00, Sa 10:00-14:00, or specific days like Monday 09:00-17:00.
jobPostingDetailsHelp: Configure structured data for this job posting. This helps your job appear in Google for Jobs and other job search engines.
jobTitleHelp: The title of the job (e.g., 'Senior Software Engineer')
jobDescriptionHelp: Full description of the job. If left empty, will use the SEO description field above.
datePostedHelp: When this job was posted. If left empty, will use the publish date.
validThroughHelp: When this job posting expires. Required by Google for Jobs.
employmentTypeHelp: Select all that apply. This helps job seekers find positions matching their preferences.
hiringOrganizationHelp: Company information. If left empty, will use global organization settings.
companyLogoHelp: Company logo image. Falls back to global organization logo if not set.
jobLocationHelp: Where the job is located. Can be remote, physical, or both.
remotePositionHelp: Check this if the position allows remote work
applicantLocationRequirementsHelp: For remote positions, specify which countries candidates must be located in (e.g., 'US', 'CA', 'UK')
physicalAddressHelp: The physical location of the job, if applicable
baseSalaryHelp: Salary or salary range for this position. Providing salary information can improve application rates.
salaryFixedHelp: Use this for a fixed salary (don't use with min/max)
experienceRequirementsHelp: Enter the number of months of experience required (e.g., '24' for 2 years)
educationRequirementsHelp: Minimum education level required for this position
qualificationsHelp: List the required qualifications, certifications, or credentials
responsibilitiesHelp: Describe the main responsibilities and duties of this role
skillsHelp: List specific skills required for this position
jobBenefitsHelp: Describe the benefits offered (e.g., health insurance, 401k, remote work)
industryHelp: The industry this job belongs to (e.g., 'Technology', 'Healthcare')
occupationalCategoryHelp: Job category or O*NET code (e.g., '15-1252.00' for Software Developers)
directApplyHelp: Check this if users can apply directly on your website
faqDetailsHelp: Questions and answers for FAQ Page schema markup.
question: Question
videoDurationHelp: Format: ISO 8601 duration (e.g., PT1M30S for 1 minute 30 seconds).
videoUrlHelp: Direct URL to the video file.
videoEmbedUrlHelp: URL for embedding the video (e.g., YouTube embed URL).
howToDetailsHelp: Information for HowTo schema markup - perfect for tutorials and step-by-step guides.
howToNameHelp: The title of your how-to guide (e.g., 'How to Change a Tire').
totalTimeHelp: Format: ISO 8601 duration (e.g., PT30M for 30 minutes, PT1H30M for 1 hour 30 minutes).
suppliesHelp: List of materials required for this guide.
toolsHelp: List of tools needed for this guide.
stepsHelp: Step-by-step instructions for completing the task.
itemReviewedHelp: The name of the product, service, or item you're reviewing.
reviewRatingHelp: Your rating of the item (1-5 scale).
reviewAuthorHelp: Name of the person who wrote this review.
recipeDetailsHelp: Information for Recipe schema markup - essential for food and cooking content.
recipeNameHelp: The name of the recipe (e.g., 'Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies').
prepTimeHelp: Format: ISO 8601 duration (e.g., PT15M for 15 minutes).
cookTimeHelp: Format: ISO 8601 duration (e.g., PT30M for 30 minutes).
recipeYieldHelp: How many servings this recipe makes (e.g., '4 servings' or '12 cookies').
recipeIngredientsHelp: List all ingredients needed for this recipe.
nutritionInfoHelp: Optional nutritional data for this recipe.
recipeVideoHelp: Optional: URL to a video showing how to make this recipe (YouTube, Vimeo, etc.)
recipeKeywordsHelp: Optional: Comma-separated keywords to help categorize this recipe (e.g., 'dessert, chocolate, easy')
courseDetailsHelp: Information for Course schema markup - for online learning and educational content.
courseProviderHelp: The organization providing this course (defaults to your site's organization).
coursePriceHelp: The price to enroll in this course (0 for free courses).
includeItemListHelp: Generate an ItemList schema for the items displayed on this collection page. Recommended for category/index pages.
isEducationalVideoHelp: Check this if the video is intended for educational purposes (tutorials, lectures, demonstrations)
educationalUseHelp: How this video is intended to be used educationally
learningResourceTypeHelp: The type of educational content this video provides
isPaywalledHelp: Check this if this content requires a subscription or payment to access. This helps search engines understand the content structure.
paywallSelectorHelp: CSS selector for the paywall element (default: .paywall). This identifies which part of the page is behind the paywall.
qaPageDetailsHelp: Configure this page as a Q&A page (like Stack Overflow or forum posts). Use this for pages with a single question and one or more answers.
qaQuestionTextHelp: Full text/body of the question with additional context
qaQuestionAuthorHelp: Name of the person who asked the question
qaQuestionUpvotesHelp: Number of upvotes/likes the question has received
qaAcceptedAnswerHelp: The answer marked as correct or most helpful
qaSuggestedAnswersHelp: Additional suggested answers that haven't been marked as accepted
offerDetailsHelp: Information about a specific offer for a product or service
offerNameHelp: The name or title of this offer
validFromHelp: The date when the offer becomes valid
priceValidUntilHelp: The date after which the price is no longer available
shippingRateHelp: The cost of shipping for this offer
shippingDestinationHelp: Geographic region where this shipping rate applies
aggregateOfferDetailsHelp: Information about multiple offers with a price range
aggregateOfferNameHelp: The name or title of this aggregate offer
lowPriceHelp: The lowest price in the range of offers
highPriceHelp: The highest price in the range of offers
aggregateOfferUrlHelp: URL where the aggregate offer can be viewed
individualOffersHelp: List of specific offers that make up this aggregate
url: URL where the offer can be purchased
